HotelDescription#This hotel is located in the south west of the island, only around 3 minutes away from the international airport at Crown Point and looks over the famous Store Bay Beach. Restaurants are located within 5 minutes, and Scarborough, the capital of Tobago with its nightclubs, public transport network and shops is only 15 minutes away.

Situated in the middle of 2.8 hectares of landscaped grounds, this 2-storey apartment complex was renovated in 2006 and has a total of 77 rooms, including 33 studios and 18 bungalows. The lobby of this beach hotel includes a 24-hour reception, a hotel safe and a currency exchange desk. Further facilities include a small supermarket, a bar, a casino, a breakfast room and public Internet access. Guests are also offered room service. Parking and bike rental is also available.

The rooms include en suite bathrooms with a hairdryer, a direct dial telephone, cable TV, Internet access, an iron and ironing board and a double bed. The kitchenette is equipped with a fridge and a cooking stove. All bedrooms feature individually adjustable air conditioning. The studios are located in the east wing of the main complex and are fitted with a double and a twin bed. They look out over the garden and the sea. The bungalows are dotted along the beautiful lawn. Since 1966, when Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II visited Trinidad & Tobago, accompanied by Prince Philip, and stayed in bungalows 9 and 10, these have been the most popular amongst guests.
